title: Kady McDermott is unrecognisable as she transforms into a white swan at the KISS Haunted House Party
text:
She's the brunette beauty who never fails to turn heads on the red carpet.

But Kady McDermott no doubt left people doing a double-take as she looked almost unrecognisable as she attended the star-studded 2019 KISS Haunted House Party at the SSE Arena in Wembley on Friday night.

The former Love Island star, 24, looked far from her usual self as she transformed into a spooky white swan for the pre-Halloween bash in London.

Transformation: Kady McDermott looked unrecognisable as she transformed into a white swan at the KISS Haunted House Party at the SSE Arena in Wembley on Friday night

Kady wore a striking leotard and tutu for a White Swan-style ensemble, which she teamed with matching stockings and perspex heels to round off the look.

She wore a platinum blonde wig to complement her ballerina outfit, and used purple hues and dazzling face glitter to contour her pretty features.

Adding a touch of spooky make-up to her look, Kady had brushed on a white feathered design across her neck to emulate bird feathers while she also wore fairy wings.

The beauty looked magnificent as she posed for snaps at the bash alongside other Love Island favourites including Laura Anderson and Lucie Donlan.

Her usual look: The former Love Island star, 24, looked far from her usual self as she transformed into a spooky white swan for the pre-Halloween bash in London

Stunning: Kady wore a striking leotard and tutu for a White Swan-style ensemble

New look: She wore a platinum blonde wig to complement her ballerina outfit, and used purple hues and dazzling face glitter to contour her pretty features

Other famous faces attending also included Love Island winner Kem Cetinay, X Factor star Ella Henderson and TOWIE's Ella Wise and Kelsey Stratford.

Kady found TV fame on the ITV2 dating show, where her romance with Scott Thomas kept fans captivated due to their tumultuous rows - including a famous outburst in which she called co-star Tina Stinnes 'a Made In Chelsea reject c**t'.

Since the show wrapped up, her work moved from TV to social media and later cosmetics as she launched her 'By Kady' make-up range.

Strike a pose: Kady looked fierce and confident as she worked the red carpet in her eye-catching ensemble

Quacking figure: Kady showcased her toned physique in the form-fitting white-swan inspired ensemble

Special effects: Adding a touch of spooky make-up to her look, Kady had brushed on a white feathered design across her neck to emulate bird feathers

Last year, she joined the cast of TOWIE as Myles Barnett's girlfriend however their stint on the show was ill-fated following a series of shocking arguments.

This culminated in the tempestuous couple being slashed from the show, however they remained defiant as he branded the programme 'toxic'.

The couple mainly keep their work limited to social media, with the duo littering their respective pages with snaps of their lavish holidays and recent home renovation.

In August, the couple called time on their year-long relationship after an explosive argument, deleting all trace of each other on social media.

Finishing touches: Completing her bird look, Kady also wore a pair of white fairy wings

Cheeky: The Love Island favourite flashed a glimpse of her derrière in her skimpy ensemble

And less than a week later, the reality TV pair confirmed they were back on track, with Kady posting a cosy selfie of the duo kissing on her Instagram platform.

Suggesting they are not planning to split again anytime soon, Kady also boasted to her followers that she and her boyfriend are going on a luxurious Pilates retreat to Thailand at the end of November.

The pair have been dating since summer 2018 and set up home together earlier this year when they purchased a bungalow to renovate in St. Albans, Hertfordshire.
description: The former Love Island star, 24, looked almost unrecognisable as transformed into a white swan for the 2019 KISS Haunted House Party at the SSE Arena in Wembley on Friday night.
